word: September 24, 1885. Attended early morning meeting. "If any man thirst let him come unto Me and drink."  I had the burden to speak of the different nationalities and the necessity of union and harmonizing in their efforts, that Italians, Germans, French, Swedes, and every tribe and nation have, not six paths, but only one model to copy, and this one mould to receive--Jesus Christ the perfect example.--Ms 16a, 1885, pp. 23-27. (Diary, "The Journey to Europe," July 7 to September 24, 1885.)
